column4: How can I upgrade to Gutsy from Feisty on a headless machine?

katevazeis to alternate cd ubuntu gutsy tribe 5 apo to http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/releases/gutsy/tribe-5/ kai akoloutheis tis odigies: http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/upgrading#head-0aee739ab0dfe9702a69ee3d316f5926d5d31807
aha, elega omos an ginetai meso apt-get giati den exei othoni to mixanima
